# Expression of the all of the Banchereau modules {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}
```{r echo=FALSE}
loadd(module_scores_pivot, module_stats_by_cluster, module_stats_by_disease)
```

## By cluster
```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=8, fig.width=12, warning=FALSE}

number_of_modules <-
  length(unique(module_scores_pivot[["module"]]))

number_of_pages <-
  ceiling(number_of_modules/9)

module_cluster_graphs <-
  module_scores_pivot %>%
  select(-disease_class) %>%
  mutate(cluster = as_factor(cluster)) %>%
  ggviolin(
    x = "cluster",
    y = "score",
    fill = "cluster",
    draw_quantiles = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75),
    add = "jitter",
    add.params = list(size = 1, alpha = 0.5)
    ) +
  scale_fill_paletteer_d("ggsci::uniform_startrek") +
  stat_pvalue_manual(
    data = module_stats_by_cluster,
    label = "p.adj.signif",
    hide.ns = TRUE,
    bracket.size = 0.1,
    tip.length = 0.01,
    size = 3
  ) +
  theme_pubr() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x =
      element_text(
        angle = 45,
        hjust = 1,
        vjust = 1,
        size = 9
        ),
    axis.text.y =
      element_text(size = 9),
    plot.caption = element_markdown()
    ) +
  labs(caption = "Mann-Whitney, Benjamini & Hochberg correction.\n *<i>p</i> <0.05, **<i>p</i> <0.01, ***<i>p</i> <0.001, ****<i>p</i> <0.0001")

for(i in seq(number_of_pages)){
  print(
    module_cluster_graphs +
      facet_wrap_paginate(
        facets = vars(module),
        scales = "free_y",
        nrow = 2,
        ncol = 3,
        page = i)
  )
}
```
